commit.message:
Auto merge of #66911 - eddyb:nicer-rustc_regions, r=matthewjasper

rustc_mir: use nicer path printing for #[rustc_regions] NLL tests.

Similar to #66850, spotted while working on #66907.

r? @matthewjasper

files.patch:
